AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Mirror Combo Discount TypeList
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (VALUE='COMBOFIXPRICE' AND (SELECT M_OFFER_TYPE_ID FROM ssdah_mirrormo WHERE ssdah_mirrormo_ID=@ssdah_mirrormo_ID@)='71895FA82C9645949CB752564FB1389D') OR (VALUE IN('FIXDISC','PERCENTAGE','FIXPRICE') AND (SELECT M_OFFER_TYPE_ID FROM ssdah_mirrormo WHERE ssdah_mirrormo_ID=@ssdah_mirrormo_ID@)='7899A7A4204749AD92881133C4EE7A57')
